divs: Sighting DetailsHello, I am a mentally handicap disabled person with slow learning disability. This morning, before I was on my way to the bus stop on 63rd & Austin, I happen to look to the east looking over the lake, I saw this huge bright light in the sky. I do NOT know what in the hell that I���m seeing here, however the object seems to be standing still as this thing was kind of twinkling or flashing in some sort of a way. I���ve took out my little Digital HD camcorder; and shot this object thing for over a minute. After I���ve got done shooting and but my camcorder back in my work bag it was gone just like that! PLEASE!!! Just tell me!!! What is it that I am seeing here??? Can you tell me what it is??? Note*** Please do not contact me by cell phone, due do that fact that I may get charges for making and receiving extra long distance charges, that may reflect on my cell phone bill; unless if this is an extreme absolute emergency!!!... Thank you very much.

Summary: What is this that I'm seeing here???
